<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Nimble Dodge](/Feats.aspx?ID=4916) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=687" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 169 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Trigger**
A creature targets you with an attack and you can see the attacker

**Requirements**
You are not encumbered

</column>

---

You deftly dodge out of the way, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

<title level="2">Nimble Dodge leads to...</title>
[Nimble Roll](/Feats.aspx?ID=4953)
name: Nimble Dodge
